Class SlowPercolationController

java.lang.Object
  edu.kzoo.grid.gui.SteppedGridAppController
      PercolationController
          SlowPercolationController

public class SlowPercolationController
extends PercolationController

A SlowPercolationController controls the running of a percolation application by looking through every location in the grid in every step and asking each object that it finds to act.

Version:
23 April 2009
Author:
Alyce Brady

Method Detail

hasReachedStoppingState

public boolean hasReachedStoppingState()
Determines whether a running application has reached a desired stopping state. In this case, stop if the latest step did not include any new percolation.

Specified by:
hasReachedStoppingState in class PercolationController
Returns:
true if the application should stop
